main.header.title: In this site we're going to explore diferents web-apis
main.header.subtitle: Web APIs
dom-fetch.header.title: Avocados, store...
dom-fetch.header.subtitle: Fetch+DOM API Example
dom-fetch.header.description: This is a simple example of how to use the Fetch API to get data from an external source and show it.
intersection-observer.header.subtitle: JS Events
intersection-observer.header.description: This is a simple example of how to use the Intersection Observer API to trigger events when an element is in the viewport. In this case we'd created a plugin to lazy loading the images.
